description: Students survey the solo art song repertoire of Germany, Italy, and Spain. The course highlights
the significant features and development of the art song, and provides context, approaches, and
resources for studying this literature.  Course work includes in-class performance. Prerequisite:
Music 214, 241, 242, or permission of instructor. Preferred prerequisite: Music 263, 264.
Offered Fall Semester 2009-10 and alternate years.
